thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Family trip
thread.title_full: Family trip - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: stinehr
title: Family trip
text:
This hotel was the perfect location for our family vacation.
The location is great, walking distance to most things you would want to do, including Times Square,Grand Central Terminal, 5th Avenue, Central Park ect..
The hotels staff, and service was great, and the rooms was just the right size. Plus the bed was really comfy :)
Will definitely recommend people staying here whilst in New York. I would for sure come back!
